summary.span: 作为所有区域控件的基类，这些区域控件是 （或其他服务器或用户）控件的容器。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for (or other server or user) controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集，在区域是一个复合控件，呈现为 HTML 表，包含 Web 页的已定义的范围中的其他控件。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page. 类是一个继承自基类的区域类，并提供一组基本的行为的派生区域包含控件、 服务器控件和用户控件。The class is a zone that inherits from the base class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls, server controls, and user controls. 组合区域与（和其他服务器） 控件窗体的 Web 部件应用程序，用户与大多数情况下进行交互的页的普通视图的主 UI。The combination of zones with (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time. 所有区域为它们包含的控件都提供一组通用的 UI 元素。All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain. UI 元素共有的所有区域的详细讨论，请参阅类概述主题面向类。For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 区域包括包含服务器控件和一个关联的正文部分用于呈现所包含的控件和其 chrome 元素中的，例如其谓词、 边框和等等的对象。The zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on. 除了从继承的功能类，类添加客户端控件拖动、 特定谓词 （以启用公共用户界面操作如最小化、 关闭、 删除和编辑控件） 和其他样式功能。In addition to the features inherited from the class, the class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features. 类也是如果你想要设计自定义时区，则数据库驱动从继承的类。The class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven. 例如，可以创建继承自一个自定义天气 Web 部件区域，并旨在包含并提供布局功能和其他服务的控件是数据绑定控件并显示天气信息。For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from , and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for controls that are data-bound and display weather information. 类包含多个用于处理区域中的样式特性的属性。The class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone. 有几个属性的边框，包括和。There are several properties for borders, including and . 没有一组用于处理可以如区域的标头中出现的菜单的样式特性的属性， ，和其他人。There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as , , and others. 类还包含用于处理区域中的谓词的成员数。The class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone. 这些成员关联的区域中的部件控件显示的谓词。These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone. 在区域级别的谓词可以添加到区域，默认情况下它们没有任何。While zone-level verbs can be added to zones, by default they do not have any. 还有一组提供的 Web 部件控件集用于部件控件的标准谓词和开发人员可以添加自定义谓词以及。There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well. 用于处理谓词的一些重要属性包括如引用的某些标准谓词对象的属性， ， ，和， ，和。Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as , , , and , , and . 标准谓词 （通常为下拉列表菜单界面中显示） 谓词菜单上显示的区域中包含每个控件的标题栏中。The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone. 此外，还有属性，它允许你确定哪种类型的可单击的对象表示 UI 中的谓词。There is also a property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI. 用于处理谓词其他键成员包括方法，即可以自定义处理的谓词创建过程中被重写一个事件处理程序和事件。Other key members for working with verbs include the method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the event. 类用于处理包含大量成员区域中包含的控件。The class contains a number of members for working with controls contained within a zone. 属性引用的所有集合（和其他服务器） 的区域中的控件。The property references the collection of all (and other server) controls in the zone. 用户可以执行上的标准谓词或操作的几个方法对应控件在区域中，如， ，和。Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on controls in a zone, such as , , and . 也有大量的中的成员类关于如何布局或该区域中排列控件。There are also a number of members in the class that concern how the controls are laid out or arranged within the zone. 属性确定控件是否可以在区域之间移动或重新排列在区域内的用户。The property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users. 属性允许您确定是否在水平或垂直排列区域中的控件。The property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically. > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能呈现的高度或以意外的方式，具体取决于该区域的方向其所含的控件。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档或属性。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 中的其他方法类为你提供对各个区域的区域呈现详细进行编程控制。Other methods in the class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone. 许多这些方法重写继承自基方法类中，以自定义的包含的区域的呈现控件。Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain controls. 重要的方法包括， ， ，和。Important methods include , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 此代码演示如何派生的类， ，用于以声明方式在 Web 部件页中包含控件。The code shows how a derived class, , is used declaratively in a Web Parts page to contain controls. 下面的代码示例具有四个部分： 前三个的各节描述了代码文件中，并第四个说明如何运行代码。The code example has four sections: the first three sections describe the code files, and the fourth explains how to run the code. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是一个用户控件，使用户能够将页切换到不同的显示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch the page into different display modes. Web 部件显示模式和说明此控件中的代码的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on Web Parts display modes and a description of the code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是包含用于处理在主要的 Web 页上的事件的代码的代码旁置文件。The second part of the code example is a code-beside file that contains the code to handle events for the main Web page. 此文件中的代码演示如何使用某些密钥成员以编程方式。The code in this file shows how to work with some of the key members programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例的第三个部分是包含的 Web 页控件显示的基的行为类，和区域中包含的控件。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls that exhibit behavior from the base class, and controls contained in the zones. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 加载 Web 页的浏览器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页切换到设计模式下，单击控件，并将它们拖可见区域之间的尝试。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into design mode, click the controls, and try dragging them between the visible zones. 单击页面以查看使用的不同成员的效果上的按钮的一些类。Click some of the buttons on the page to see the effect of using various members of the class. 接下来，切换页后，可以编辑模式。Next, switch the page to edit mode. 请确保控件置于`WebPartZone2`，单击该控件的标题栏上的谓词菜单，单击**编辑**编辑该控件。Make sure a control is positioned in `WebPartZone2`, click the verbs menu on the control's title bar, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 完成该控件的编辑，然后编辑一个其他区域中的控件。Finish editing that control, and then edit one of the controls in the other zone. 当你执行这些步骤，请注意用户界面样式的控件和区域中的差异它们使用的各种成员的效果类。As you carry out these steps, notice the differences in the UI styles of the controls and the zones, which are the effect of using the various members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性才会生效，仅当区域在页面显示模式下在其中的区域中的控件布局可以更改，如。The property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as . 当设置为`false`位于给定区域，所以有大量，阻止最终用户在该区域中控件上执行的操作：When is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - 用户不能将控件拖动到不同的区域、 重新排列控件在该区域，或将控件移到该区域。Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone. - 有大量的影响的用户界面 (UI) 的属性区域中的控件被禁用，以便用户无法编辑这些属性，当正在使用编辑控件时和控件...A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the and controls.. - 用户无法将新控件添加到区域中，从控件。Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a control. - 关闭、 删除、 最小化，并还原谓词不会显示在该区域中控件。The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone. 尽管属性会影响最终用户能够更改通过 UI 区域的布局，它不会影响能够以编程方式更改布局。Although the property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically. 例如，如果设置为`false`，用户无法关闭该区域中的控件，但开发人员仍可以调用方法来关闭以编程方式控制。For example, if is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the method to close controls programmatically. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性设置为`true`，这是默认设置。Notice that the property is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果你将值更改为`false`，在将页加载到浏览器并将页切换到设计显示模式后，你将不能将控件拖动内或到`WebPartZone2`区域。If you change the value to `false`, after you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you will not be able to drag controls within or into the `WebPartZone2` zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#3)]

span.span: A that enables end users to close controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的关闭谓词属性出现在每个谓词菜单区域中的控件。The close verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 关闭控件将其删除从交互在页中，虽然如果开发人员提供相应的用户界面 (UI)，如包含区域控件，用户可以切换到页和添加的以前返回到页的控件的已关闭的实例。Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a zone that contains a control, a user can switch the page into and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 对于该代码示例能工作，你需要从示例部分的所有代码属性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分取自分部类中，并包含代码，用于切换帮助谓词是启用还是禁用。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the help verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 代码示例的其他部分是承载自定义控件，并包含用户界面的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the UI. 请注意，声明性``区域中的元素设置表示中的谓词菜单的关闭谓词的特定文本控件。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the close verb in the verbs menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 另请注意，因为基础自定义控件-名为`TextDisplayWebPart`-中代码示例将使用属性`false`在其构造函数，``在目录中的元素必须设置属性`true`，以便可以在下面的代码示例中关闭该控件。Notice also that, because the underlying custom control--named `TextDisplayWebPart`-- used in the code example sets the property to `false` in its constructor, the `` element in the catalog must set the property to `true`, so that the control can be closed in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 加载浏览器中后，将页切换到目录的显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`到页面的控件。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 复选框可用于启用和禁用关闭谓词，并且你可以单击**关闭 web 部件**谓词菜单来关闭控件中的谓词。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the close verb, and you can click the **Close WebPart** verb in the verbs menu to close the control. 如果将页返回到目录的显示模式，则关闭该控件后，你可以单击**页目录**，选择的原始实例`TextDisplayWebPart`控制你关闭，然后重新打开该页面上。After you close the control, if you return the page to catalog display mode, you can click the **Page Catalog**, select the original instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control that you closed, and reopen it on the page.

span.span: Closes a selected control in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最终用户关闭的典型方式控件是通过单击控件的标题栏中的关闭谓词。The typical way for an end user to close a control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar. 方法调用方法类，该类执行的操作的控件右大括号。The method calls the method on the class, which carries out the action of closing the control. 该方法应只用于通过派生如区域。The method should only be used by derived zones such as . 关闭控件不呈现在页上。A closed control is not rendered on a page. 相反，它被添加到页目录中，保留在页面上的所有已关闭的控件的列表。Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page. 如果 Web 部件页，用户在其关闭控件还具有``元素可以使用声明，则用户可以将页切换到目录的显示模式，并将已关闭的控件添加回页面。If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `` element declared with a , then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 用户能够关闭控件，在控件上的属性和区域上的属性必须同时设置为`true`。For a user to be able to close a control, the property on the control and the property on the zone must both be set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页开发人员可以将处理程序添加到此事件，并附加到的其他自定义谓词子区域。Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a child zone. 为一个区域，请创建谓词时引发事件发生阶段的页处理负载，或在回发事件。The event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the stage of page processing, or during postback events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何创建处理程序通过重写事件方法将自定义谓词添加到派生区域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 此代码示例包含两个源文件。The code example contains two source files. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 下面的代码示例的第一部分是的简单控件派生自的源代码类。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是为派生的源代码重写的区域方法将自定义谓词添加到区域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 该代码还谓词菜单中创建显示的自定义谓词控件包含在该区域，并且此谓词创建另一份当前控件。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例的第三个部分是承载派生的区域的网页和控件。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 页面顶部附近是`Register`指令以引用派生的区域的组件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果你将加载在浏览器中，页控件出现在该区域。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 单击谓词菜单中，然后单击**CopyWebPart**谓词，并创建一份控件。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件 chrome 指帧每的外围设备的用户界面 (UI) 元素区域中的控件。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control in a zone. 有关 chrome控件包含其边框、 标题栏、 和图标、 标题文本和谓词菜单标题栏中显示。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观设置在区域级别和适用于所有区域中的控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all controls in a zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象会影响整个呈现控件，而不仅仅是其 chrome 元素。The object affects the entire rendering of the controls, not merely their chrome elements. 若要使用方法中，你必须创建自定义对象可以在区域中定义的 Web 部件控件 chrome 的外观。To use the method, you must create a custom object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone. 你还必须创建继承自一个自定义区域类，并重写能够替换你自定义 chrome 对象并将其应用到该区域中控件的方法。You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the class and overrides the method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的 delete 谓词属性将显示在每个动态的标题栏中的谓词下拉列表菜单区域中的控件。The delete verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic control in a zone. 删除谓词不是可在静态控件 （在网页上的标记中声明） 上的。The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page). 该谓词都会出现谓词菜单中的页时才在显示模式下，可用于更改页面布局中，例如或。The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as or . 永久删除控件从一个页面中删除该控件的实例。Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page. 与关闭的控件，永远不会返回到页添加控件的已删除的实例。Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page. 当用户删除控件，然后切换到页，如果区域不包含控件，已删除的控件实例不在它可用。When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into , if the zone contains a control, the deleted control instance is not available in it. 如果控制可在目录中，但已被永久移除已删除的实例，用户可以添加一个控件的新实例。The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 对于该代码示例能工作，你需要从示例部分的所有代码属性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分取自分部类中，并包含代码，用于切换删除谓词是启用还是禁用。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the delete verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 代码示例的其他部分是承载自定义控件，并包含用户界面 (UI) 的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，声明性``区域中的元素设置表示的谓词下拉列表菜单中的删除动词的特定文本控件。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the delete verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中后，将页切换到目录的显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`到页面的控件。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 复选框可用于启用和禁用删除谓词`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，但该谓词时，会出现在菜单上只有页处于目录或设计的显示模式。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the delete verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, but the verb appears on the menu only while the page is in catalog or design display mode. 如果你单击**删除 web 部件**菜单上的谓词，永久删除该控件，并且已删除的实例不能添加回页面。If you click the **Delete WebPart** verb on the menu, the control is permanently deleted, and the deleted instance cannot be added back to the page. 但是，可以将页返回到目录的显示模式，并添加的新实例`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。However, you can return the page to catalog display mode, and add a new instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被拖动的控件放在其中可以删除它，显示放置提示区域，显示在其中可以删除控件的区域，它适用于这些区域，以及区域本身当中，区域时，属性会影响的边框颜色。When a dragged control is held over a zone where it can be dropped, drop-cue regions appear, showing the area in which the control can be dropped, and it is for these regions, as well as the zone itself, that the property affects the border color. 属性使您能够设置所显示的颜色为用户，当它们在区域中拖动控件。The property enables you to set the color that appears to a user when they drag a control in the zone. 属性才会生效，仅在网页上正在启用要进行更改，如的区域的布局的显示模式时。The property takes effect only when a Web page is in a display mode that enables the layout of a zone to be changed, such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性值设置为特定的颜色。Notice that the property value is set to a specific color. 在将页加载到浏览器并将页切换到设计显示模式后，你可以查看的属性影响，当你选择，并将控件拖动在其区域内，或将另一个控件拖到该区域。After you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you can see the effect of the property when you select and drag the control within its zone, or drag another control into the zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以区分属性尚未设置的情况下，以及它已设置为空字符串 ("")。The property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string (""). 如果未设置的属性且区域不包含任何控件，Web 部件页面输入的显示模式向该区域是可见，则默认区域性特定的文本消息都将出现在一个空控件。If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty control. 如果有意为空字符串，设置属性值，然后在空区域中不显示任何文本消息。If the property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性具有的声明性标记分配给它的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 此值将出现在`WebPartZone2`之后将页加载到浏览器中，, 将页切换到设计显示模式中，并将显示从日期控件拖动`WebPartZone2`到`WebPartZone1`。This value will appear in `WebPartZone2`, after you load the page into a browser, switch the page into design display mode, and drag the control that displays the date from `WebPartZone2` into `WebPartZone1`. 更改 Web 部件页中的显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on changing display modes in a Web Parts page, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 代码示例的其他部分是承载自定义控件，并包含用户界面 (UI) 的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，声明性``区域中的元素设置表示的谓词下拉列表菜单中的导出动词的特定文本控件。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the export verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 最后，请注意，在下面的代码示例，声明性上的属性值``元素设置为值`All`，意味着将导出在控件上的所有可导出的属性值。Finally, notice that in the following code example, the declarative property value on the `` element is set to the value `All`, meaning that all exportable property values on the control will be exported. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 加载浏览器中后，将页切换到目录的显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`到页面的控件。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 复选框可用于启用和禁用导出谓词`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the export verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 如果单击导出谓词，则会提示为要保存该控件的定义文件的本地路径。If you click the export verb, you are prompted for a local path to save a definition file for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取的初始集合控制为区域，仅当没有预先存在的模板或其他形式的存储，用于确定在区域中的控件。The method gets the initial collection of controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone. 该方法不会反映任何个性化修改，这可能意味着，初始集合中的控件实际上已移用户到另一个区域。The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone. 初始集合区域中的控件并不一定中包含的集合相同区域，该部分页呈现时，采用反映的区域中的控件的实际当前集合的属性到的帐户已做的任何个性化设置更改。The initial collection of controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.

## Remarks 可以访问属性，以声明方式或以编程方式。The property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. 你可以通过访问它以声明方式在区域内使用``元素中设置文本、 说明、 是否已启用的谓词，以及其他特性。You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes. 它不需要声明一个区域，但是，帮助谓词，因为默认情况下启用。It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default. 为了使帮助谓词能够显示在的谓词菜单上是必需的唯一步骤在运行时区域中的控件是将值赋给属性为各个控件。The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the property for individual controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 对于该代码示例正常工作，除下面的代码中，你需要自定义控件。For the code example to work, in addition to the following code, you need a custom control. 你可以使用您自己的控件，或使用自定义代码`TextDisplayWebPart`控件的示例部分中找到类概述。You can either use your own control, or use the code for the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包括用户控件，使你能够更改在网页上的显示模式。This code example includes a user control to enable you to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式和此控件中的源代码的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 此代码示例还包括可能包含帮助内容的 HTML 页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。This code example also includes an HTML page that could contain Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 对于此示例正常工作，必须将以下代码保存在名为 Textwebparthelp.htm 的文件，然后将其放置在你的站点承载的.aspx 页与相同的目录`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

[!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例的其他部分是承载的.aspx 页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件并演示了利用属性。The other part of the code example is the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control and demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，页面上，顶部附近`<@ Register %>`声明用于引用已编译`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，该文件应放在名为 Bin 的子控件。Notice that near the top of the page, an `<@ Register %>` declaration is used to reference the compiled `TextDisplayWebPart` control, which should be placed in a subfolder named Bin. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性问题 Web 部件控件区域中的布局方式。The property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone. 使用默认方向，将控件呈现从上到下排列中, 根据的每个控件的值。With the default orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the value of each control. 与方向，控件排列并排显示、 主题区域的宽度。With a orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone. Internet 资源管理器可能会影响的高度控件，以及包含它的区域的高度。Internet Explorer can affect the height of a control, and the height of the zone that contains it. Internet Explorer 呈现在兼容性模式下 （与以前的浏览器版本向后兼容），或在标准模式下的网页 (由存在`DOCTYPE`在页中的声明)。Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 有关这些模式的信息，请参阅 DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)属性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. 当 Internet Explorer 呈现标准模式中的页时，在某些情况下它并没有进行调整单元格在表中，即使在单元格的 HTML 标记``。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 因此，控件和其包含的区域呈现，因此，控件不会拉伸到该区域的最大高度。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 在两个情况下发生这种类型的呈现。This type of rendering occurs in two cases. - 当区域的属性设置为，且在区域上显式设置的高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，不要指定水平区域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone. - 当区域的属性设置为，并且未显式设置区域 （或包含的控件） 的高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls). 若要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，垂直区域中设置的区域或控件的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone. 本主题中的代码示例演示如何正常使用属性。The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the property. 有关演示高度相关的呈现问题以及如何解决它的代码示例，请参阅属性。For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用的属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative and programmatic use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性具有的声明性标记分配给它的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 此值会影响`WebPartZone1`之后将页加载到浏览器。This value impacts `WebPartZone1`, after you load the page into a browser. 水平呈现该区域中的 Web 部件控件。The Web Parts controls in the zone are rendered horizontally. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#2)] 你可以单击**切换布局方向**按钮以更改该区域的方向。You can click the **Toggle Layout Orientation** button to change the orientation of the zone. 若要切换方向音中的分部类的以下代码示例。The code to toggle the orientation occurs in the following code example from the partial class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在没有自定义时，应用属性中具有的谓词菜单对象其属性值设置为`true`。The property applies only when there is a custom object in a verbs menu that has its property value set to `true`. 中包含的样式特性属性适用于显示菜单中的谓词的文本旁边的复选标记图像的样式。The style attributes contained in the property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu. 每个中控制区域可拥有其自己的谓词菜单标题栏中。Each control in a zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar. 谓词菜单可以包含 Web 部件控件集和自定义中包含两个标准谓词由开发人员创建的对象。The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom objects created by developers. 中的标准谓词控件谓词菜单-包括的谓词导出、 删除和打开帮助页--执行其任务一次并的单次操作谓词中进行。The standard verbs in a control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done. 存在就无需曾经将标记中的菜单带有复选标记，这些谓词，因为其中任何一个指示任何种类的持续状态。There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state. 因此，这些谓词的属性不能设置，和属性不适用于这些根本。Therefore, the property on these verbs cannot be set, and the property does not apply to them at all. 但是，开发人员可以创建自定义控件可能表明某种持续状态带有复选标记，通过设置其属性`true`。However, developers can create a custom control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的样式信息属性适用于谓词菜单中中的单个谓词中，当用户鼠标指针悬停谓词之一。The style information contained in the property applies to an individual verb in a verbs menu, when a user positions a mouse pointer over one of the verbs. 尽管此属性是只读的也可设置的基础的样式特性对象。Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying object. 因为使用 Microsoft Internet Explorer 弹出对象创建的菜单中包含的谓词，菜单不会正确呈现其边框时你将鼠标指针置于具有不同的文本长度的谓词。Because the menu that contains the verbs is created using Microsoft Internet Explorer's pop-up object, the menu does not correctly render its border when you place your mouse pointer over verbs that have different text lengths. 此最佳解决方法是声明``具有不可见的边框，因此所有谓词的菜单宽度的大小完全相同的元素。The best workaround for this is to declare a `` element with an invisible border, so the menu width for all verbs is exactly the same size. 声明性的元素将出现在区域中，并如下，如下所示：The declarative element would occur within a zone, and would look as follows: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性具有的声明性标记分配给它的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 此值会影响`WebPartZone2`。This value impacts `WebPartZone2`. 页加载到浏览器之后，请将页切换到编辑模式。After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode. 单击谓词菜单中，并请注意的背景色中的控件上的谓词菜单`WebPartZone2`是分配给它的声明性标记的颜色。Click the verbs menu, and notice that the background color for the verbs menu on the control in `WebPartZone2` is the color assigned to it in the declarative markup. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 下面的代码示例的其他部分是承载自定义程序的 Web 页控件，并包含用户界面 (UI)。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，声明性``区域中的元素设置的值`Description`属性显示为工具提示中，当用户鼠标指针悬停谓词菜单中的谓词的文本。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中后，将页切换到目录的显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`控制转移到页上，如果尚未添加。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 复选框可用于启用和禁用最小化谓词`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the minimize verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 启用谓词后，你也可以单击它最小化控件。When the verb is enabled, you can also click it to minimize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写方法在派生区域添加额外的类的对象添加到你的时区中的标准谓词的集合。You can override the method in a derived zone class to add additional objects to the collection of standard verbs in your zone. 你可以执行此操作通过将谓词添加到集合中属性。You can do this by adding verbs to the collection in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何创建处理程序通过重写事件方法将自定义谓词添加到派生区域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 此代码示例包含两个源文件。The code example contains two source files. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 下面的代码示例的第一部分是的简单控件派生自的源代码类。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是为派生的源代码重写的区域方法将自定义谓词添加到区域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 该代码还谓词菜单中创建显示的自定义谓词控件包含在该区域，并且此谓词创建另一份当前控件。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例的第三个部分是承载派生的区域的网页和控件。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 页面顶部附近是`Register`指令以引用派生的区域的组件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果你将加载在浏览器中，页控件出现在该区域。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 单击谓词菜单中，然后单击**CopyWebPart**谓词，并创建一份控件。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现区域，也不能是页眉和页脚区域之间的主要内容区域包含正文区控件。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法重写中的基方法类以提供地址布局和样式的专用的呈现属性应用于区域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply uniquely to zones. 该方法将呈现表包含的正文的整个内容，并在该表中，设置不同的属性值，具体取决于各种情况，包括是否属性设置为垂直或水平，以及是否页当前正在设计的显示模式。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including whether the property is set to vertical or horizontal, and whether the page is currently in design display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够检索具有的所有标题栏中的谓词的样式属性的样式对象区域中的控件。The property enables you to retrieve a style object with style attributes for the verbs in the title bars of all controls in a zone. 应用此属性仅当谓词实际呈现在标题栏中，例如，当属性值设置为。The property applies only when verbs are actually rendered in the title bar, such as when the property value is set to . 尽管该属性引用的对象是只读的但你仍可更改标题栏中的谓词的基础样式特性。Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still change the underlying style attributes for the verbs in the title bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件谓词表示用户可在 Web 部件页，例如最小化、 关闭或还原控件; 的用户界面 (UI) 中执行的操作将控件添加到页;或取消操作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 谓词由在 UI 中的可单击的对象，可以设置为通过使用显示为超链接、 图像或按钮属性。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button by using the property. 属性适用于存在仅在区域级别，而不是在每个中存在的谓词的谓词区域中的控件。The property applies to verbs that exist only at the zone level, as opposed to verbs that exist in each of the controls in a zone. 例如，当您将页切换到目录模式或编辑模式时，区域级别的谓词中有仅适用于整个区域级别操作的区域的页脚。For example, when you switch a page into catalog mode or edit mode, there are zone-level verbs in the footers of the zones that apply only to actions at the level of the entire zone. 时使用较旧的 （"向下级别"） 浏览器访问 Web 部件页，将应用属性。The property is applied when the Web Parts page is accessed with an older ("down-level") browser. 必须将值赋给每个指定的动词，若要使映像若要为该谓词其区域中显示的属性。You must assign a value to the property for each specific verb to cause an image to appear for that verb in its zone. 如果你不需提供图像的 URL，该谓词的属性默认为。If you do not provide the URL to an image, the verb's property defaults to . 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以包含对从直接继承的控件的引用类，以及其他 ASP.NET 服务器控件或区域中的自定义控件。The property can contain references to controls that inherit directly from the class, as well as other ASP.NET server controls or custom controls within a zone. 动态设置 Web 部件控件换行不是任何控件控件用作控制在运行时; 此机制，可用作 Web 部件控件的 ASP.NET 控件的所有类型。The Web Parts control set dynamically wraps any control that is not a control as a control at run time; this mechanism enables you to use all types of ASP.NET controls as Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 下面的代码示例访问属性以编程方式，并显示列表中包含的控件`WebPartZone1`。The following code example accesses the property programmatically and displays a list of the controls contained in `WebPartZone1`. 将页加载到浏览器后，单击标记按钮**列表 WebPartZone1 web 部件**。After you load the page into a browser, click the button labeled **List WebPartZone1 WebParts**. 显示的 Id 和类型的控件。The IDs and types of the controls are displayed.
